languages.text: "Не думай, что ваши преступления прощены. Вы оплатите их не только тронами, но и пролитой в боях кровью".
"Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."
languages.original_text: "Не думай, что ваши преступления прощены. Вы оплатите их не только тронами, но и пролитой в боях кровью".

traits.locale_text: "Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."
"Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."
"Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."

"Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."

languages.text: “别以为你们的罪行已经得到了宽恕。你们必将付出代价，不仅仅是王座币，还有鲜血的代价。”
languages.original_text: "Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."

traits.locale_text: “别以为你们的罪行已经得到了宽恕。你们必将付出代价，不仅仅是王座币，还有鲜血的代价。”

languages.text: 「許されたとでも思ったか？お前には罪滅ぼしをしてもらう。スローンだけではなく、血も使ってな」
languages.original_text: "Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."

traits.locale_text: 「許されたとでも思ったか？お前には罪滅ぼしをしてもらう。スローンだけではなく、血も使ってな」

languages.text: «No piense que sus crímenes han sido perdonados. Pagará por ellos, no solo con tronos, sino también con sangre».
languages.original_text: "Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."

traits.locale_text: «No piense que sus crímenes han sido perdonados. Pagará por ellos, no solo con tronos, sino también con sangre».

languages.text: "Glaubt nicht, dass Eure Verbrechen vergeben seien. Ihr werdet für sie bezahlen, nicht nur in Thronmünzen, sondern auch in Blut."
languages.original_text: "Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt nicht, dass Eure Verbrechen vergeben seien. Ihr werdet für sie bezahlen, nicht nur in Thronmünzen, sondern auch in Blut."

languages.text: « N'allez pas croire que vos crimes sont pardonnés. Vous allez devoir les racheter ; non seulement avec des trônes, mais aussi avec votre sang. »
languages.original_text: "Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."

traits.locale_text: « N'allez pas croire que vos crimes sont pardonnés. Vous allez devoir les racheter ; non seulement avec des trônes, mais aussi avec votre sang. »

languages.text: "Suçlarını bağışlanmış sanma. Hepsinin bedelini tek tek ödeyeceksin. Gerek geltle gerek kanla."
languages.original_text: "Do not think your crimes have been forgiven. You will pay for them, not only in thrones but in blood as well."
